Sentencas: Influence of various intermediate oxides on thermal, structural and crystallization kinetics of 30BaO-40SiO(2)-20B(2)O(3)-10A(2)O(3) (A = Y, La, Al, Cr) glasses has been studied.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The highest glass transition temperature (T-g) with high thermal stability is observed in Y2O3 containing glasses as compared to other glasses.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) increases with increasing heat treatment duration in all the glasses.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The maximum increase in TEC is observed in Cr2O3 containing glass ceramics.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: FTIR study showed that transmission bands due to silicate and borate chains become sharper with splitting after heat treatment.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A selected glass sample (BaCr) has been tested for interaction and adhesion with Crofer 22 APU interconnect material for its application as a sealant in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: (C) 2010 Elsevier Ltd and Techna Group S.r.l.
Titulo: Effect of A2O3 (A = La, Y, Cr, Al) on thermal and crystallization kinetics of borosilicate glass sealants for solid oxide fuel cells
